results.content: A large part of the course teaches you how to install software, a skill which is unrelated to the topic of this course. The smaller part shows you how to embed Google Fonts on your website, but the presenter rushes over it so quickly that you have to pause the video many times. Not worth it at all - you could learn more from browsing the Google Fonts website.

results.content: Interesting course with a lot of information, given in simple steps!
results.content_html: Interesting course with a lot of information, given in simple steps!

results.content:
Give more videos with examples how they can use Google Fonts, not hot to install firefox or sublime since those are irrelevant for this course. You explained Google Fonts really well and this course is for that but you really need to insert more examples to show your students how to achieve something.
PS its a bit irritating to search for google.com in a search bar just to search for something else when you open google web page, its done automatically

results.content: it was very informative, the lessons focused purely on what is needed to master and how to use google fonts
